goals__remit:
Dawex is a global data marketplace where organizations meet, buy and sell data, directly and securely. Acting as a trusted third-party, we operate on a transactional-based revenue model. 
Our goal is to contribute to the Data Economy by facilitating cross border data flow and making data exchange accessible and secure for all economic stakeholders.
